text: The Citizen Revolution Movement () is a democratic socialistLA FUERZA DE NUESTRAS IDEAS political party in Ecuador. Supporters of former President Rafael Correa started the party. They left Correa's PAIS Alliance party when Len√≠n Moreno became president. The party has had problems registering for elections. The party is left-wing. ==References== Category:Political parties of Ecuador
title: Citizen Revolution Movement
